Understand Child Development.introduction.msg_list: This lesson is about helping you support Your Child’s healthy development as they grow and change. ✨
Understand Child Development.importance.msg_list:
🌱 Children have different abilities at different stages of their development. 

⚽ It is important to be aware of Your Child’s skills at this stage. 

✨ This helps you plan activities for them that match what they can do and helps you have realistic expectations of them.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.1.question: True or False: All children develop at the same speed as each other.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct:
✅Correct! 

✨ Each child is unique and will develop at their own pace. Some children may develop faster than others in some ways, while some may take more time.

💚 It is important that parents are patient and supportive, recognizing that every child has their own individual path of development. 

❗Remember that issues with your child’s development are not always obvious, and your child’s condition is NOT your fault.

🚩 If you have concerns about Your Child's development, you should seek help from a professional to get support and advice.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect:
❌ That is incorrect.

✨ Each child is unique and will develop at their own pace. Some children may develop faster than others in some ways, while some may take more time.

💚 It is important that parents are patient and supportive, recognising that every child has their own individual path of development. 

❗Remember that issues with your child’s development are not always obvious, and your child’s condition is NOT your fault.

🚩 If you have concerns about Your Child's development, you should seek help from a professional to get support and advice.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.2.question: Let’s do another short quiz! How can you respond if Your Child suddenly expresses interest in changing how they dress or their hairstyle?
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.2.values: Reject all their requests and say it is not necessary. | Warmly ask more about what influenced their interest to change and why. | Give in to all of Your Child’s interests.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.2.answer: Warmly ask more about what influenced their interest to change and why.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.2.feedback_correct:
🎉 That’s right! 

💚 By warmly asking Your Child questions about their interests, they will feel comfortable sharing about the influences around them. 

🌷 You can gently give your opinions about their interests. 

⭐ You can also gently advise them which changes would work within your household and community.
Understand Child Development.quiz.content.2.feedback_incorrect:
❌ Incorrect. 

💚 By warmly asking Your Child questions about their interests, they will feel comfortable sharing about the influences around them. 

🌷 You can gently give your opinions about their interests. 

⭐ You can also gently advise them which changes would work within your household and community.
Understand Child Development.comic.intro: {F1_FATHER} is helping his children, {F1_SON_5} and {F1_DAUGHTER_6}, learn how to play soccer and interact with each other well:
Understand Child Development.comic.text.1:
**{F1_FATHER}**: “Gently kick the ball using the inside of your foot, like this.”

**{F1_SON_5}**: “I want to do it now!!”

**{F1_DAUGHTER_6}**: “No, I want to do it first!!”
Understand Child Development.comic.text.2:
**{F1_FATHER}**: “It can be hard to wait, but we cannot all go first. {F1_DAUGHTER_6}, can you suggest a way for us to take turns kicking the ball?** 

**{F1_DAUGHTER_6}**: “Okay! We can make a circle, and I kick the ball to {F1_SON_5}, then he kicks it to you {F1_FATHER}, and you kick it back to me!” 

**{F1_SON_5}**: “Yes, that sounds great!”
Understand Child Development.comic.text.3: **{F1_FATHER}**: “That’s a fantastic idea, {F1_DAUGHTER_6}! Let’s give it a try!”
Understand Child Development.comic.text.4: **{F1_FATHER}**: “Well done, {F1_DAUGHTER_6}! You took the lead, and we all had so much fun taking turns! {F1_SON_5}, you were also great at patiently waiting for your turn.”
Understand Child Development.tips.intro:
Children at this stage will start to express themselves by wanting independence and trust. 🎈

They begin making their own choices, and they may talk back to adults to show that they know the correct answers. 🎨⚽

At the same time, they will show emotions in their own unique ways. 😃😒😔😣

Here are 3️⃣ three tips to support the healthy development of Your Child at this age. 💚
Understand Child Development.tips.message.1.text:
1️⃣ FIND FRIENDS

🎨 Your Child will be interested in spending time with other children. 

⚽ Support Your Child to make friends based on their interests so that they develop relationships with other children.

💚 Help Your Child learn how to share and play with others in a safe and fun way.
Understand Child Development.tips.message.2.text:
2️⃣ SUPPORT CURIOSITY

📖 Your Child will be interested in learning at school and may have favourite subjects. Encourage Your Child to ask you or the teacher about any topics they don’t understand. 

🌱 Your Child may begin expressing interest in religious matters or spirituality. You can give Your Child short but honest answers.
Understand Child Development.tips.message.3.text:
3️⃣ TRUST YOUR CHILD

 📝 Your Child may begin making decisions by themselves. They will want you to trust them. Listen to what Your Child wants and then set rules that work for the family. 

🏆 Praise Your Child when they follow the rules!
